secondaryHeading.text: Calculate how much your ISA could be worth

description.text: Every tax year, you can invest up to £20,000 into an ISA and you’ll pay no tax on any growth or returns you earn. Want to know how much your money could grow over time with a stocks and shares ISA? Try our ISA calculator and we’ll show you what your ISA could be worth in 20 years.

belowText.text: As with all investing, your capital is at risk. The value of your portfolio with Nutmeg can go down as well as up and you may get back less than you invest. Projections are never a perfect predictor of future performance, and are intended as an aid to decision making, not as a guarantee. A stocks and shares ISA may not be right for everyone and tax rules may change in the future. If you are unsure if an ISA is the right choice for you, please seek financial advice.

text.text: Our projections calculate the projected long-term return for each portfolio across a range of possible outcomes. These are illustrated as fan-charts over the 20 year term. Your portfolio comprises different assets, including equities and bonds, in different proportions depending on the portfolio risk level. In general, the higher the risk of a portfolio, the greater the proportion of equities and the higher the level of projected return.

Nutmeg projects equity returns equal to 30% of the projected volatility (risk) projections. Projected volatility is mapped to 2010-2020 historical volatility, in order not to project historical data excessively into the future. We consider the 30% Sharpe ratio to be a conservative assumption. Long-term bond projected returns are calculated based on our estimates of long-term economic growth, which are sense-checked from official and independent forecasts. Finally, cash interest return is derived using average yield-curve projections.
The projected value represents the portfolio value after costs and charges have been taken. The fan charts show the probabilities of achieving potential outcomes:

More likely:
This range of outcomes comprises the 20% to 80% probability range, being centred around the projected value.

Projected Value:
This is the projected expected value; the value in the middle of the full range of projected outcomes. In the language of probability, 50% of all outcomes fall below the projected value.

Less likely:
These outcomes comprise two ranges. On the low-side is the 5% to 20% segment. On the high-side is the 80% to 95% segment.

The projections include the effect of all costs, including Nutmeg fee, investment fund costs and effect of market spread. They do not include the effects of inflation, of tax on investment income or on capital gains, of changing your risk profile, or of future changes to our investment strategy. You should note, you don’t pay tax on income or capital gains from investments in an ISA. We also assume that income is reinvested and that any monthly contributions you make are maintained.
Any promotion applied to your account is not taken into account within the projection.

primaryLabel.text: How does the ISA calculator work?

text.text: If you’re curious about how much you’ll need to invest each month, or how long it could take to reach your investment goal, our calculator will give you an indication. Fill in your risk level, starting amount and monthly contributions and we’ll calculate what kind of timeframe you could be looking at. Even if you have no particular investment goal in mind, we’ll let you know how much your stocks and shares ISA could be worth.

Your projected value and lowest projected outcome include the effect of Nutmeg fees, investment fund costs, and market spread — personalised according to your planned contributions — but does not take into account the effects of inflation or tax. Your calculation also assumes income is reinvested and that any monthly contributions you make are maintained.

primaryLabel.text: Why should I choose a Nutmeg ISA?

text.text: Sign up or transfer to a Nutmeg stocks and shares ISA in minutes and let us do the investing for you. Choose the investment style and risk level that works for you, log in from any device and keep tabs on how your ISA is performing. Globally diversified, transparent and designed by experts. We believe in no nonsense investing.
Select an investment style and risk level and our in-house investment team will manage a globally diversified portfolio on your behalf.
